Liz Earle Superskin Concentrate

Brand: Liz Earle

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Corylus avellana (hazelnut) seed oil, Rosa rubiginosa seed oil, Argania spinosa kernel oil, Persea gratissima (avocado) oil, Citrus aurantium amara (neroli) flower oil, Tocopherol (vitamin E), Linalool, Anthemis nobilis flower oil, Lavandula angustifolia (l

dula angustifolia (lavender) oil, Limonene, Geraniol, Farnesol, Coumarin.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
